title: Ranked Borders
body:
Are the ranked borders for this season map specific or queue specific? I know that 3v3 borders won't show up in 5v5 (not that we have that option anyway) but will ranked teams and solo queue be separate?

So if my ranked 5's team was higher than my solo queue ranking, would my ranked 5's team border show on all Summoner's Rift matches (5v5 ranked, team builder, blind pick, solo queue) or would it only show in ranked 5's and my solo queue border would be the one that shows for all other matches.

I think I remember season 3 being map specific, so it was just whichever Summoner's Rift ranking was higher, but I haven't heard if it has changed or not.
